query:
SELECT 
  CASE WHEN invoiceDate IS NULL THEN 'On Order' ELSE 'Delivered' END as status,
  CASE WHEN areaId IS NULL THEN 'Unmatched' ELSE 'Matched' END as match_status,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM purchases
WHERE isExcluded = 0
GROUP BY 
  CASE WHEN invoiceDate IS NULL THEN 'On Order' ELSE 'Delivered' END,
  CASE WHEN areaId IS NULL THEN 'Unmatched' ELSE 'Matched' END
ORDER BY status, match_status
command:

  CASE WHEN invoiceDate IS NULL THEN 'On Order' ELSE 'Delivered' END as status,
  CASE WHEN areaId IS NULL THEN 'Unmatched' ELSE 'Matched' END as match_status,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM purchases
WHERE isExcluded = 0
GROUP BY 
  CASE WHEN invoiceDate IS NULL THEN 'On Order' ELSE 'Delivered' END,
  CASE WHEN areaId IS NULL THEN 'Unmatched' ELSE 'Matched' END
